name: @vensst/vite-plugin-ssh-deploy
description: A Vite plugin to deploy build output to a remote server via SSH with backup and rollback.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && tsc --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs && mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/index.cjs.js && rimraf dist/cjs
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm publish --access public

author: vensst
